subject: Fee and other expenses payable to the DisputeREview Experts and Dispute Review Board Members.
text: HTr 7c <TTHT wifearTT 714 /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a YRa87, 73+ VRa67t 37 rotAlif TATT) Y4 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 7 I9 National Highways Authority of India WA !Extn: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #1-5 Wa 6, 7qe<-10, BTrWFT, 7 @crif-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn: January 0Z, 2008 1o PQLICY MATTERS-ADMNISTRATIONFIANCE (22/2008) Decision taken on DR QA Cell's File No NHAI/DR & QA CellARB/2O0S) Sub: Fee and other expenses payable to the Dispute Review Experts and Dispute Review Board Members. It has been decided that the fee and other charges payable to the Dispute Review Experts and Dispute Review Board Members shall be as given in the schedule below SCHEDULE Sr. Particulars of fee and other Amount payable No_ charges Retainer-ship secretarial Rs.10,000/- per month for one package and maximum assistance and   Incidental of Rs.20,000/-per month for 2 or more packages (telephone, postage etc.) Daily fee site visit Rs. 4,000/ - Traveling Expenses Economic Class by Air, A C First Class by train and AC Taxi by road, Lodging @) Up to Rs 10,000/- per day (metro cities) (ii) Up to Rs. 5000/- per (other cities) (ii) Rs2000/-per day_ (own arrangement) 5 Extra charges for other than Rs. 2,000/- per hearing meeting days (travel upto maximum  of 2 on   each occasion_ Note: - 1 Lodging, boarding and traveling expenses shall be allowed only for those members who are residing 100 kms. away from place of meeting: 2 Delhi; Mumbai, Chennai, Kolkata, Bangalore and Hyderabad shall be considered as Metro Cities. 3_ The fee indicated above shall be applicable w.ef 01.01.2008 to the already constituted DREIDRBs and for future DREIDRBs. 2 This issues with the approval of the Chaimman. (V.KSharmh) General Manager (Admn.) 1_ PS to Chairman 2. PSIPA to All Members CGMsl CVO 3 _ AIl GMs/DGMsMManagers 4_ AlI PIUsICMUs/SPVs 5 .
